outline:
1. to rule, have dominion, dominate, tread down
    1. (Qal) to have dominion, rule, subjugate
    2. (Hiphil) to cause to dominate
  2. to scrape out
    1. (Qal) to scrape, scrape out
kjv_def: (come to, make to) have dominion, prevail against, reign, (bear, make to) rule,(-r, over), take.
strongs_def: to tread down, i.e. subjugate; specifically, to crumble off
